short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Orading as a multi-exchange trading platform helps crypto traders by accessing to the market data & all cryptocurrencies prices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Orading as a multi-exchange trading platform helps crypto traders to trade better and easier. It offers advanced tools to trade on your accounts remotely, from Orading's side, so you can monitor all your accounts from one single interface.
âž¤  ALL EXCHANGES IN ONE PLACE
âž¤  ALL TRADES IN ONE PLACE

On our chrome extension, you can check all cryptocurrencies' prices and access the latest market data. You can also enable a default coin (e.g. BTC) to enable the following features on your browser:
âœ” Accessing the latest price by right-clicking on anywhere  (Live auto-updating)
âœ” Accessing the latest price and other info by Hovering on the extension icon ðŸš€
